definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: Conclusion Ether soaking method can be used for the qualitative analysis of volatile oil from Lignum Santali.
sentences.chinese: 乙醚浸漬法可用於檀香揮發油的定性分析。

sentences.english: Aether has little influence on the cell livability.
sentences.chinese: 乙醚對細胞的存活率影響不大。

sentences.english: Using ether to spilt influenza virus to produce this vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 利用乙醚裂解流行性感冒病毒，製得該疫苗。

sentences.english: And the ether presses your nose and mouth, hard. Then nothing, less than nothing.
sentences.chinese: 乙醚重重的壓住了你的鼻子和嘴。

sentences.english: And the plasma sample was extracted with aether.
One's got a rag in his hand, and you can smell the ether.
sentences.chinese: 有個傢伙拿了塊抹布，你可以老遠就聞到乙醚的氣味。

sentences.english: We discussed the technological conditions of synthesizing propylene glycol monoether acetate.
sentences.chinese: 對合成丙二醇單乙醚乙酸酯的工藝條件進行了討論。

sentences.english: The ether extracting technology of carya kernel oil was experimentally studied in this work.
sentences.chinese: 對乙醚浸提法提取山核桃油的工藝條件進行了試驗。
